meanings.definition: Coming after something in time; following.
meanings.sent1: The subsequent chapter of the book revealed the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The subsequent events unfolded just as predicted.
meanings.sent3: The subsequent arrival of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her subsequent success in the competition was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The subsequent rain shower cooled down the hot day.

meanings.sent1: The subsequent steps in the recipe were easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The subsequent meetings were scheduled for next week.
meanings.sent3: The subsequent dance moves were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His subsequent decisions led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The subsequent waves crashed against the shore with force.
